description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Capsicum Skewers With Satay Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken & Capsicum Skewers With Satay Sauce
name: Chicken & Capsicum Skewers With Satay Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook skewers on grill, turning, for 5 minutes until charred and cooked through. Serve with warm satay sauce and rocket leaves.
